item.title: Fuck working Mondays. I've got better things to do.
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: Why I Don’t Work Mondays (And Maybe You Shouldn’t Either) — Monday is my reset button after a hectic weekend full of kids, football, and family chaos. No meetings, no commute, just space to breathe, walk the dogs and reconnect with me. It’s not lazy — it’s intentional.
